articles.title: Google’s AI try-on app Doppl adds a shoppable discovery feed - TechCrunch
articles.description: The tech giant says the idea behind the new feed is to display recommendations so users can discover and virtually try on items. Nearly everything in the feed is shoppable, with direct links to merchants.
articles.content:
Google announced on Monday that it’s introducing a shoppable discovery feed in Doppl, its experimental app that uses AI to visualize how different outfits might look on you.
The tech giant says the … [+1774 chars]
